document_data.mainbody:
arnesh was a bounty hunter mage active in the late 14 century DR.
Tarnesh was armed with a simple quarterstaff and his spellbook contained simple spells such as mirror image, horror, and magic missile.
In the , Tarnesh put his sights on Gorions Ward, Abdel Adrian. A hefty bounty of 200 gold coins was placed on Abdels head. The wizard tracked his mark down at the entrance to the Friendly Arm Inn. Tarnesh was unlikely to have survived the confrontation.
